website_summaries.verdict: Small, but mighty miniature cupcake machine is super fun for kids under supervision. Disney lovers will embrace this appliance.
pros: Comes with cute animal print cupcake liners that will make kids smile
Will make cupcakes in under 4 minutes
You can use any boxed or scratch cake mix
cons: Standard cupcake liners will not fit the molds
You may need an oven mitt since the machine heats up fast
Young kids should not operate device alone

customer_reviews.title: Sooo cute, perfect and fun!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect! It’s so much fun for our 4 year old’s birthday! Another reviewer suggested using mug treats (as in the picture) and it was absolutely perfect. It took less then 5 minutes to prepare and cook them with no mess. They are adorable cakes and 1 mug mix made exactly enough for 1 set of 4 cupcakes. I used milk in the mix, it suggested milk or water, and they came out great In about 2 minutes!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Kinney

customer_reviews.title: Adorable, Gets Extremely Hot...
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old loves her cupcake maker. Easy to clean, uses very little counter space. However, it should not be used without supervision as it gets really hot & the top closes very easily on its own. It came with cupcake liners but did not include candy molds.
customer_reviews.author: Shatia J.

customer_reviews.title: Fast & easy
customer_reviews.text: This thing gives me easy bake oven flashbacks but it’s legit and it makes perfect, tiny little cupcakes that even the most dedicated dieter can eat without guilt😁 But beware...it will take you a thousand years (or cupcakes) to get through a normal box of cake mix. My little baker loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Nicolez84

customer_reviews.title: Great little cupcake maker!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter for her 7th birthday and she loves it! She loves to bake and this is the perfect size for her to make a few little treats to practice on. I've been using the popular mug cake recipes which work really well as they generally make one batch of 4 in this cupcake maker. They cook in about 4 minutes which is awesome. We've made cupcakes, mini pancakes, and muffins and they all turned out great. So much better than an Easy Bake Oven. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: K. Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty. Runs very hot!
customer_reviews.text: I love the way it looks, but it runs entirely too hot! I thought that maybe this would be good to use with my small niece. I’m so glad I tried it by myself first. I made pupcakes, and they were almost burnt on top. You definitely have to have an oven mitt and be extra careful with this cupcake maker.
customer_reviews.author: Shedirewolf

customer_reviews.title: To cute to pass up
customer_reviews.text: I have used all the baby cakes machines prior, this one seems no different, great results and you get the bow molds to go with☺️
customer_reviews.author: Mary Steinfelt

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: This is so cute! It comes with 100 cupcake liners and a silicone mold for making candy bows. This is a perfect gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fast cooking easy to use
customer_reviews.text: My six year old with a small amount of supervision can make cupcakes in 4 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: tuff

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and cooks mini cupcakes in 2 minutes. ...
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and cooks mini cupcakes in 2 minutes. Reminds me of a George Foreman grill. This is not a child's toy
customer_reviews.author: Mary A. Hodge

customer_reviews.title: 9 year old loves this
customer_reviews.text: 9 year old daughter loved this Christmas gift. The cupcakes are super tiny though
customer_reviews.author: momof2

customer_reviews.title: Great item but did not include liners in the box
customer_reviews.text: Love the cupcake maker....but was supposed to come with 100 animal print cupcake liners. Looked through everything and they were not there. We had to go to store and buy liners to use. Our 3 year old loved the cupcakes once we got them made.
customer_reviews.author: Peoples B.

customer_reviews.title: Cupcakes in 4 minutes!
customer_reviews.text: This was so much fun to do with my 4 and 6 year old. You do have to make the batter but the recipe in the book is yummy. Just really fun and quick cupcakes. It does get very hot! It was a little hard to figure out howto get the cupcakes out
customer_reviews.author: Earl Peters

customer_reviews.title: Missing extras that say on box included
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t have the silicone bow mold or the paper cupcake liners. Don’t they check boxes before they close them up. Poor manufacturing! Keeping it because birthday gift and don’t have time to return for another one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for my daughter as a birthday gift. We used it once and we decided never again. The batter doesn’t bake evenly, it burns the donuts due to no control on temperature. It left a bad taste in my mouth. Also to mention this product was advertised much bigger but when I received it, it completely disappointed me.
customer_reviews.author: Aldina Sehic

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use to make mini cupcakes for my daughter. Only downside is to find the cupcake liner with the size of normal one but half of it on the height.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was super easy and fun for my 4year old daughter! So convenient and kid-like, but also taught baking responsibilities, as this does get hot! Cupcakes came out awesome. I would suggest keeping them in for a tad longer than instructions says, since it takes an extra a minute or two for cake to cook completely through.
customer_reviews.author: Angie F.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item for my 4yo daughter Christmas and she said its her favorite gift. Its easy to use and bakes her cupcakes fast, all I have to do is plug it in and she does the rest.
customer_reviews.author: Annessa

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: My family loved making cupcakes in these! Nice and small, easy to clean, and I love the fact that it comes with accessories and the mold. I even made mini pancakes in this. Easy to store. Wish the cord was longer though.
customer_reviews.author: Mine Covington

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Seems well made and came well packaged haven’t used it yet it’s a gift for my kids 6th bday
customer_reviews.author: kh

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: WAS FUN TO USE WITH GRAND KID, BUT A BIT TOO SMALL
customer_reviews.author: Tillie Guerrero

customer_reviews.title: Disney mini cupcake maker
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great product and the kids love using it with me
customer_reviews.author: donna

customer_reviews.title: Fun making delicious cupcakes!
customer_reviews.text: I love baking cupcakes with my granddaughter With the mini mouse cupcake maker it’s an activity we do together almost every visit. I’m sure it is making many memories For us both
customer_reviews.author: rose

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Simple and quick 3 minutes. Plus it works with real cake batter mix. My five year old was happy to have minimum assistance while making cup cakes!
customer_reviews.author: Komimyishea S White

customer_reviews.title: Returning because they sent a used product.
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t know if it works or not. When I opened it to make cupcakes with my extremely excited young daughter. I discovered it was USED! It was sticky with crud on the plates. YUCK! Absolutely disgusting and very disappointing for my child that was eager to bake.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Cuutteeeeee
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it! It was a great gift choice for sure. My only thing is figuring out when they are done is a total guess on time. Once you get the feel for the machine its easy selling though and they cook fast.. mini little muffins but cooks fast
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Not Impressed
customer_reviews.text: cupcake holders are very flimsy. There are no cake mixes that come with this product
customer_reviews.author: terri heald

customer_reviews.title: Much faster than an Easy bake oven
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 4 year old granddaughter. It’s the perfect side and is so much faster than an easy bake oven
customer_reviews.author: K.S.

customer_reviews.title: Fun to use with younger children or in limited space
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to bust out mini Minnie cupcakes for a Minnie Mouse Tea Party. They make big neat batches quickly while ur doing other things. Also the chocolate molds sell the kit. Being able to put the cute chocolate bows on top was special.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: She loved the product. It is efficient, bakes and in minutes. It is awesome, specially for the price. It also comes with a mold and cupcake sheets.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Birthday Present
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old granddaughter absolutely loves this cupcake maker.
customer_reviews.author: Shemeka Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Yum
customer_reviews.text: These make awesome mini cupcakes. One mix makes about 34 cupcakes and uses half a container of standard icing. Very happy. Only compliant is now I have to eat double the cupcakes lol... Kids loved helping
customer_reviews.author: Scottey Luedeke

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. Purchased it for my 4 y/o daughter and she loves it. The cupcakes come out nice and fluffy and only takes about 3 minutes to bake 4 of them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super small and cute
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter as a Christmas present, is definelty better than the easy bake oven. The mug cake pouches work well for making 4 cupcakes at the time.
customer_reviews.author: Mina

customer_reviews.title: Great lil Cupcake Maker
customer_reviews.text: The clean up and perfect for a young girl just learning kitchen basics.

customer_reviews.title: Its worth every penny !!🙂
customer_reviews.text: Its super cute love how they're just the right size for my 4 year old the cupcakes that is...

customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this makes awesome mini cupcakes in no time easy cleanup awesome gift. Chose this over an easy bake oven and I’m glad I did

customer_reviews.title: Great value, cooks mini cupcakes quickly.
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter loves it! I help her with this because she is only 5. She loves to decorate her cupcakes!! Not disappointed with this purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Great product and it works great too
customer_reviews.text: This thing rocks!!! I got this for my little girl who is seven. And she just loves it!!! Great product and it works great too!!!!

customer_reviews.text: This cupcake maker was great for my 5 year old niece. It was easy and safe for her to use. I'm buying another one for my other niece...

customer_reviews.title: Simple and easy
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for my 8 year old that currently lives with her other parent. I needed something fun, easy and safe to send.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for little girls!!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughters absolutely love it! I ordered this for Christmas and it actually bakes all the way through. Easy clean up and put away.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cupcake making is a fun and easy thing do do with your preschooler.

customer_reviews.text: Has hot section so easy for a kid to get burned. Makes a perfect cupcake every time!

customer_reviews.title: EASY TO CLEAN, it should not be used without supervision as it gets really hot & the top
customer_reviews.text: IT WAS FOR MY NIECE AS A BIRTHDAY GIFT SHE LOVED IT
customer_reviews.author: lee

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase we made over the holidays
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase we made over the holidays. My kids are completely obsessed. So easy to clean. We use muffin mix in the mornings for the kids breakfast
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was not impressed the way this item arrived to me.
customer_reviews.text: The shipping box and product were both wet and damaged
customer_reviews.author: Monique EvansWescott

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great to start baking with toddlers. Very quick bake because little girls are impatient.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for little bakers
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my great-granddaughter's third birthday. She loves Minnie Mouse and cupcakes. She loves helping Mommy with her baking. She likes that she can use this with only a little help. She also enjoys the bow mold. Sometimes they use it to make bow-shaped candy.
customer_reviews.author: lindaj

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very durable safe and user friendly for. 4 yr old with supervision
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This item didn't work and plus the cupcakes were really tiny so I returned it and got a refund
customer_reviews.author: Paula Candeias

customer_reviews.title: Adorable, delicious, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter for her 5th birthday amongst other things...gotta say, best $15 I've ever spent! Lol. She LOVES this. And I love it because I don't have 3 dozen cupcakes sitting around my house. It makes 4 miniature cupcakes. We just used a bisquick cupcake recipe I found online. We followed the instructions that came with the cupcake maker and the cupcakes turned out great. Of course you have to supervise your little ones, but she had a great time using it and the cupcakes cook in 3-4 minutes, so she didn't lose her patience during that time.
customer_reviews.author: Clairebear

customer_reviews.title: totally adorable. my daughter and I love to bake
customer_reviews.text: totally adorable. my daughter and I love to bake, but making big cupcakes is crazy most times. this thing is great cooks four mini cupcakes in four minutes. my three year old loves to mix, put liners in and then close the machine. great little thing. use any box mix. yummy and perfect size. buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my granddaughters for Christmas since they love cupcakes, but we only used this once before I returned it for refund. Read many reviews, so I knew the cupcakes would be tiny, but not as tiny as they came out, and they continued to stick to the liners each time unless you spray a little cooking oil. Actually they came out better without the liners. Overall, they were not interested in making them again.
customer_reviews.author: R. Willis

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 7 year old niece that loves to cook! She was so very excited! You definitely need parent assistance as this is an appliance and gets hot. One box of cake mix goes a long way. Her mom mentioned that they make about half a box and save the rest of the mix for another time. So far they love it. It also comes with the mini cupcake liners!
customer_reviews.author: Janellemp

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all ages
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter for Christmas. When i tell you i use this more than her. It’s just the right size for me bc i had weight liss surgery. We make muffin, brownies, mini cakes, and i even out some waffle mix in them. Perrrrffeect !!! I’m going to experiment with eggs to if i can make bite size egg muffins for work. But totally worth the money and sooo easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Fabeona

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use and easy clean up too
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter's 5th birthday. She loves it ! So easy to use and easy clean up too. Makes the perfect sized cupcakes for a little one and you can use any cake mix you desire ....love it !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my five year old who had asked for a kid oven. It had a few small cosmetic flaws but so far works great. We use it for Friday tea parties. It is very straightforward and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Supremely happy with this purchase. Perfect for my 7 y/o with supervision. THANK YOU to the reviewer who mentioned the mug cakes! Makes 4 mini cupcakes without the hassle of kids cracking eggs.
customer_reviews.author: B. Lassie

customer_reviews.title: Small but its for kids
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller in real life but it will work great for my nieces.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla G

customer_reviews.title: upsetting
customer_reviews.text: doesn't work anymore. used it 1 time and it broke. tried to use it for my daughter's bday party and it wouldn't heat up anymore. only good thing about this was the bow pan.

customer_reviews.title: Really great product
customer_reviews.text: Works amazingly well! Birthday present for my 6 yr old daughter. She loves it so much!

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: What a perfect gift! Good quality and easy to use. I love the recommendation about buying the individual cup; cake makers. It’s a perfect amount to fill each tray.

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: Worked well, while it worked, didn’t last 6 months, not worth the money

customer_reviews.title: Where do you buy mini liners?????
customer_reviews.text: Love the cupcake maker, but have searched all over God's creation looking for more mini liners, and no luck.

customer_reviews.title: Use adult supervision
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 5 and bakes with mom often. Having her own little cupcake oven is the best. It works great and of course with supervision.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this instead of a easy bake oven and was pleased with it. With some supervision my Niece enjoyed making cupcakes on her own!

customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 7 year old and she loves it.

customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this cupcake maker!! It’s pretty and easy to use!! Always making cupcakes!

customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and quick to bake. My granddaughter loves it!

customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift for the little Disney lovers. My five year old niece loves it! She can't wait to make everyone cupcakes.

customer_reviews.text: My granddaughters LOVE this cupcake machine. Only 15$ compared to easy bake oven its a MUCH BETTER cooking product.

customer_reviews.title: its ok
customer_reviews.text: It was for a 3yr old she loved it but it made a mess the holes not deep enough.

customer_reviews.title: Small size great for young children
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my young niece - so cute! Small size great for young children.

customer_reviews.title: No so good for me.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for the silicone mold which was perfect for making chocolate bows for cupcakes. The cupcakes that this makes are not so good. They are not a standard size so once the liners that come with it are gone, your a** out. There is no way to get more. I didnt try without the liners. That might work. It makes a short cupcake.

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her mini cupcake maker. Very easy to use.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I love that the single mug cake mixes work with this.

customer_reviews.title: Ripped off
customer_reviews.text: Where is the bow molds? Great if you just want a mini cupcake maker with a picture of Minnie Mouse on it. That's all I got. But I had to give it as a gift.. so I can't return it. I was looking forward to making chocolate bows for my daughter's cupcakes but it never arrived inside of the box and I'm unsure how it would have fit in the box. Rip off.
customer_reviews.author: Geeta Galaway
